product_name: mophie Juice Pack Air Case - iPhone 5
long_description: The mophie Juice Pack Air case for iPhone 5 or 5s offers a rechargeable battery concealed inside a protective case. It virtually doubles your battery life and protects your phone at the same time. Integrated pass-through buttons and mute switch seamlessly blend the case with your iPhone's functions. Thin and light case offers the full protection of a hard shell. Built-in, rechargeable battery can be set to Charge or Standby with the flip of a switch. Integrated LED status indicator tells you exactly how much juice is left. Included USB cable recharges your phone battery and case battery simultaneously and syncs your iPhone 5/5s to iTunes without removing it from the mophie Juice Pack Air case.
short_description: The mophie Juice Pack Air case for iPhone 5 or 5s offers a rechargeable battery concealed inside a protective case. It virtually doubles your battery life and protects your phone at the same time.
